SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rnum, p.* FROM ( SELECT product_no, product_name, product_sub_name, product_thumb, product_price, product_info, product_latitude, product_longitude, product_writer, product_status, TO_CHAR(enroll_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS enroll_date FROM product WHERE product_status = 1 AND (product_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR product_sub_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR product_info LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ORDER BY enroll_date DESC ) p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_no, AVG(review_score) AS avgScore -- 평균 별점 계산 FROM review GROUP BY product_no ) r ON p.product_no = r.product_no -- 상품 번호를 기준으로 조인 )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rnum, p.*, COALESCE(likeCount.total_like_count, 0) AS productLikeCount, -- 좋아요 수 COALESCE(r.avg_review_score, 0) AS avg_review_score -- 평균 별점 FROM ( SELECT product_no, product_name, product_sub_name, product_thumb, product_price, product_info, product_latitude, product_longitude, product_writer, product_status, TO_CHAR(enroll_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS enroll_date FROM product WHERE product_status = 1 ORDER BY enroll_date DESC ) p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_no, AVG(review_score) AS avgScore -- 평균 별점 계산 FROM review GROUP BY product_no ) r ON p.product_no = r.product_no -- 상품 번호를 기준으로 조인 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_no, AVG(review_score) AS avg_review_score -- 평균 별점 계산 FROM review GROUP BY product_no ) r ON p.product_no = r.product_no -- 상품 번호를 기준으로 조인 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_no, COUNT(*) AS total_like_count FROM wish GROUP BY product_no ) likeCount ON p.product_no = likeCount.product_no ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT p.*, COALESCE(w.product_like, 0) AS productLike, -- 좋아요 여부 (0 또는 1) COALESCE(likeCount.total_like_count, 0) AS productLikeCount, -- 좋아요 수 COALESCE(r.avg_review_score, 0) AS avg_review_score -- 평균 별점 FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rnum, p.* FROM ( SELECT product_no, product_name, product_sub_name, product_thumb, product_price, product_info, product_latitude, product_longitude, product_writer, product_status, TO_CHAR(enroll_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS enroll_date FROM product WHERE product_status = 1 ORDER BY product_no DESC ) p ) p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_no, user_no, 1 AS product_like FROM wish WHERE user_no = (SELECT user_no FROM user_tbl WHERE user_email = #{userEmail}) ) w ON p.product_no = w.product_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_no, AVG(review_score) AS avg_review_score -- 평균 별점 계산 FROM review GROUP BY product_no ) r ON p.product_no = r.product_no -- 상품 번호를 기준으로 조인 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_no, COUNT(*) AS total_like_count FROM wish GROUP BY product_no ) likeCount ON p.product_no = likeCount.product_no WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{pi.start} AND #{pi.end}
